name: healthcheckpro_infosys
description: Health Check Pro is a user-friendly health website built using the MERN stack

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend dev" "npm run frontend dev"
scripts.install: npm run frontend install && npm run backend install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend start" "npm run frontend build"
scripts.build: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
